mapper.select: SELECT pj_syllabus_lesson.*, pj_teacher.`name` AS teacher_name, bw_room.`name` AS room_name FROM pj_syllabus_lesson LEFT JOIN pj_teacher ON pj_syllabus_lesson.teacher_id = pj_teacher.id LEFT JOIN bw_room ON pj_syllabus_lesson.room_id = bw_room.id WHERE pj_syllabus_lesson.id = #{id}
select id, syllabus_id, lesson, day_of_week, teacher_id, subject_code, subject_name, room_id, create_date, modify_date, is_deleted from pj_syllabus_lesson limit #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT pj_syllabus_lesson.*, pj_teacher.`name` AS teacher_name, bw_room.`name` AS room_name, pj_team.name AS teamName FROM pj_syllabus_lesson LEFT JOIN bw_room ON pj_syllabus_lesson.room_id=bw_room.id LEFT JOIN pj_teacher ON pj_syllabus_lesson.teacher_id = pj_teacher.id LEFT JOIN pj_syllabus ON pj_syllabus_lesson.syllabus_id =pj_syllabus.id LEFT JOIN pj_team ON pj_syllabus.team_id=pj_team.id WHERE pj_syllabus_lesson.teacher_id=#{teacherId} AND pj_syllabus_lesson.is_deleted=0 AND pj_syllabus_lesson.lesson=#{lesson} AND pj_syllabus_lesson.day_of_week=#{week} AND pj_syllabus_lesson.start_date <= #{startDate} AND pj_syllabus_lesson.end_date >= #{startDate} AND default_flag =0 ORDER By pj_syllabus_lesson.create_date DESC LIMIT 1
